key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks due to increasing scrutiny and uncertainty in the litigation finance industry
Dependence on unpredictable litigation case outcomes leading to revenue volatility
Reputation risks from involvement in high-profile and controversial cases
Market competition pressures impacting margins and growth opportunities
controversies: Involvement in the YPF matter and allegations of market manipulation
Rejection of Burford's claim under the EU Market Abuse Regulation by the High Court of Justice
governance_issues: Regulatory uncertainty and strategic shifts due to evolving legal landscapes
